org.rrd4j.core

Class XmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rrd4j.core.XmlWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class XmlWriter
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Extremely simple utility class used to create XML documents.
